LanguageData.ThreshingMachine.label: Threshing machine
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine.description: 【Role: Threshing】 Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to Momi. Efficiency in order to do by human power is bad.
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Blueprint.label: Threshing machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Blueprint_Install.label: Threshing machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Frame.label: Threshing machine (building)
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Frame.description: 【Role: Threshing】 Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to Momi. Efficiency in order to do by human power is bad.
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry.label: Rice stone slurry
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry.description: 【Process: Threshing】\nAgricultural tools for threshing rice to produce brown rice. Working efficiency is poor as it is working by hand.
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Blueprint.label: Rice stone slurry (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Blueprint_Install.label: Rice stone slurry (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Frame.label: Rice stone slurry (building)
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Frame.description: 【Role: Threshing husks】 Agricultural tools to consume Momi and convert it to Brown rice. Efficiency in order to do by human power is bad.
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine.label: Rice milling machine
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine.description: 【Role: Threshing husks,Polished rice】 Agricultural tools to consume Brown rice and convert it to White rice. Machine which was born only for the desire to eat delicious white rice.
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine_Blueprint.label: Rice milling machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine_Frame.label: Rice milling machine (building)
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine_Frame.description: 【Role: Threshing husks,Polished rice】 Agricultural tools to consume Brown rice and convert it to White rice. Machine which was born only for the desire to eat delicious white rice.
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine.label: All-purpose rice processing machine
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine.description: 【Role: Threshing,Threshing husks,Polished rice】 Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to White rice.
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine_Frame.label: All-purpose rice processing machine (building)
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine_Frame.descri: 【Role: Threshing,Threshing husks,Polished rice】 Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to White rice.
